content: We are well positioned to deliver these strong results given the improvements in the supply chain, which we expect will allow us to increase production and drive higher volumes of fully completed units, resulting in stronger wholesale and margins; and second, the continued robust demand for products with robust retail so far in Q3, a high level of snowmobile pre-orders, very positive reception of our new product introductions leading to strong momentum with bookings following the recent Club, and a very solid inventory replenishment opportunity.
